name: Zumba
description: Zumba is an exercise fitness activity based on the rhythms of Latin dance music-- salsa, reggaetón, merengue and cumbia Dance with Zumba in the Parks! We offer free Zumba classes, allowing program participants to get outside, stay active and enjoy a fun, exhilarating activity with San Francisco parks as the backdrop. Meet inside clubhouse Instructor: Nelly
fullDescription: Zumba is an exercise fitness activity based on the rhythms of Latin dance music-- salsa, reggaetón, merengue and cumbia Dance with Zumba in the Parks! howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
